attributes.action: Compulsory for schools to remove the Bubble System for those tested negative.
attributes.additional_details: I am a student myself living in London the school has been divided into zones therefore I and the pupil in London are unable to get the education recourses for example the rooms that have been divided and the skills ability sets. This needs to change for us to do well.
attributes.background: As you know schools have 'The Bubble System' making education harder for students as during covid-19 the school buildings are divided into zones for each year groups which does not allow students to the recourses they require. So all schools should scrap the bubble system for the childrens sake.
